ygData.subject: RE: Need more bards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Have you tested this, or proven it?  This is the first I ve heard that cycling the song doesn t increase mana rate, as the song pulse is direct mana
ygData.messageBody:
> Clarity's effectiveness seems to max out at 1 pulse ever 6 sec
> (if you stop/start to get the messages more frequently, you
> only get mana at the equivalent rate of just leaving the song
> playing - 1 pulse every 6 sec). So if you have a decent

Have you tested this, or proven it? This is the first I've
heard that cycling the song doesn't increase mana rate, as
the song pulse is direct mana restore. I would think the
more pulses, the more restoration. Although I haven't tested
this either, so I could be mistaken.

Harmonic.
